name: Gold Digger Maze
description: A puzzle game in which you have to look for gold in a maze in complete darkness. Use the lights to light your way and try not to get lost.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Core2Duo Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 Storage: 250 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: QuadCore Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 or better Storage: 300 MB available space
